verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janmambutone paapivi neevu neetimantude ledu kaama, krodaa, lobha, moha papapu daaguliviye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dharmakarmala vastrambu neevu kappukonna daagavu nee paapamu kadigi neetiga theerche owshadambemi ledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Theliyadu neeku nee marana dinamu nischintagaa nundedavaa paapa phalitamu narakame vinumu vidipinchedi vaarewaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapamuvalana nee jeevitamunu nashtaparachukonduva ? bharimpaleni naraka baada edpegaa nee phalitamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapapu shiksha needai yunda ninnu rakshimpanenche Siluva sramalu barinchenesu neekai raktamu karchegaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oppukonumu nee papamulanu aparadhinanchu vedu thana rakthamandu kadugunu ninnu rakshana nondedavu{/lang-eng}
